remarks: The predicate "is a subspace."  (Contributed by NM, 26-Jan-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
isssp.g $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
isssp.f $e |- F = ( +v ` W ) $.
isssp.s $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
isssp.r $e |- R = ( .sOLD ` W ) $.
isssp.n $e |- N = ( normCV ` U ) $.
isssp.m $e |- M = ( normCV ` W ) $.
isssp.h $e |- H = ( SubSp ` U ) $.
isssp $p |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> ( W e. H <-> ( W e. NrmCVec /\ ( F C_ G /\ R C_ S /\ M C_ N ) ) ) ) $.
